scripts.dev: npm run generate && docker compose --env-file .env.dev -f docker-compose.base.yaml -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up --watch
scripts.test-compose: npm run generate && docker compose --env-file .env.test -f docker-compose.base.yaml -f docker-compose.test.yaml up
scripts.prod-local: npm run generate && docker compose --env-file .env.prod-local -f docker-compose.prod-local.yaml up  --force-recreate
scripts.full-deploy: npm run build && npm run push && npm run remote-pull && npm run sync && npm run remote-deploy
